name: The Rise of the Metal God.
name_original: The Rise of the Metal God.
description:
The Rise of the Metal God.

A Platformer Shooter.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Arrows to Shoot

E to Use Item

Or Joypads.

Up to Two players (Coop) must have two controllers.

Players share Health.

Player Two cannot pass the One Way Floors and he can drop in and out by pushing the start button.

Made With Godot.
